Title: Ways to Bury a Man
Writer: Jonathan Tropper (created by), David Schickler (created by), Doug Jung
Actors: Antony Starr, Ivana Milicevic, Ulrich Thomsen, Frankie Faison
Plot: Hood goes after Proctor with a vengeance after he discovers that Proctor was behind Jason's death. Max has a severe asthma attack. Gordon and Carrie discuss their options. Alex Longshadow faces a no-confidence vote by the Tribal Council.
